scripts.db:save: docker compose exec database mysql -e 'SET GLOBAL innodb_fast_shutdown=0;' && docker compose stop database && docker compose run --rm -v $(pwd)/backups:/backups database tar cvfz /backups/database_$(date '+%Y-%m-%d_%H-%M-%S%z(%Z)').tar.gz var/lib/mysql && docker compose up -d database
scripts.test: npm -s run lint && tsc && npm run test:unit
